flawed_nl_solution:
Annie starts with 21 + 36 = <<21+36=57>>57 crayons.
Bobby ends up giving her 36 / 2 = <<36/2=18>>18 crayons.
Annie now has a total of 57 + 18 = <<57+18=57>>57 crayons.
She ends up giving Mary a total of 57 * (1/3) = <<57*(1/3)=19>>19 crayons.
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 57. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
